data.text: Hiwa thengnga, Jisu'n Galilee suungnga aleileeng; Ama'n Judea ramsuungnga leisizootmak, ajarchu khawa khanna kaom Jihudi ngai'n ama kha thatnasik inlei-entok.
Jihudi ngai Soongmachumna Kahoi kha aleinai, Levi 23:34; Innidan 16:13
Khawa jarra ama unai ngai'n amadiang inleiti, nang itho chuon ngaikha nasiamruoi ngai'n inmunasik-ah “Hiwa munhi mathaan inlang Judea-ah sitro.
Tuteii miring innum araming aminsizoot inchu achuontho kha thupmak. Hiwa chuon ngaihi nithojei keengnga, manmasituol pumpui diang nang injettro.”
Ama a-u anai takngai innum amadiang leingamnamu.
Jisu'n inmanidiang aleiti, “Kei kapha kha laheitungmak, takkha nangni sikchu aphakha omchei.
Manmasituol in nangnichu namatir theinunu, takkha keichu innamatir, ajarchu Kei'n inchuontho ngaikha dikmak tia sakhi kapeii.
Nangni kahoi khan sitru; hiwa kahoi hin Kei sinuning,7:8. Kei sinuning; Manuscripts lekkhat in hin ti Kei lasimong. ajarchu kei kapha kha laheitungmak.”
Hiwahi atia ama'n Galilee ah aleiom.
Takkha anai ngai'n kahoi munkhan insisuo thengnga, Jisu um inlarleiya ruuk-ah aleisi.
Jihudi ngai'n ama kha kahoi munkhan “Ma hun omme?” tia inlei-entok.
Mipui karra ama jarra tamthei num inleiti. Miring lekkhat in “Amahi mi katha eii” inleiti, lekkhat ngai'n “Emak,” “Ama'n mi katamtak lamleiitiang akeiruoi” inleiti.
Takkha inmani'n Jihudi ngaikha inleichi jarra tuteii innum inlarra ama jarra leirilmu.
Kahoi alai ahongtungdeng phakhan Jisu'n Biak-inn tiang asiya khat-um kaminchu aleiphut.
Jihudi ngai'n inngak-ah inleiti, “Angtho tholi hiwa mi'n inchu lekleiya hituk ijetme?”
Jisu'n inmanidiang aleimasang, “Kei iminchuhi kei kata emak, takkha kei kanajuotir ama ta kha eii.
Tu ka-ang mi'n Pathian lungdou thosik-ah akadang inchu, ama'n kei minchunahi Pathian makheiya kajuobe emakli kei katheinuo ta kirilbe tikha ajetsik eii.
Ama thomatorna ranak-ah karil ama khan apumtak inpaaknasik aril; takkha ama kajuotirpa minpaak sik-ah ka-entok miring khachu akadik kha eii, khat-um amadiang katuunmak iteii ommak.
Moses in Sinadan inaleipeii emak abe? takkha nangni tuteii innum Sinadan kha juimakchu. Angjarra nangni'n kei nathatnasik ning-entokme?”
Mipui ngai'n inleimasang, “Nang nasuungnga raikhuo om! Tu in nang nathat sik-ah na-entok ame?”
Jisu'n inmanidiang aleimasang, “Kei'n chuon inlak inkhat katho, halli nangni rakip ngai'n ningngak.

Moses in nangnidiang wun tanru tia chong analeipeii (Moses diangnga inphut emak takkha nangni ningpi ningpu ngaidiang makheiya eii), halli nangni'n pasal naikha Sabbath nikhuoni wun ningtan. Levi 12:3; Inphut 17:10
Pasal nai khan Sabbath nikhuoni wun intan khat-um Moses Sinadan kha koimak inle, angjarra Kei'n miring inkhat Sabbath nikhuoni apum kamindamli nangni'n keidiang ningraangme? Jn 5:9
Meel en-inlang chongkatan kha emaru, takkha akadik khan chong tanru.”
Jerusalem makheiya miring lekkhat ngai'n inleiti, “Hiwa mipa hi emak abe inmani ngai'n thatsik-ah inlei-entok?
Enru! Ama'n mipui karra arilla aom, khat-um inmani ngai'n amadiang iteii timu! thomatorna ranak kanei inmani ngai'n inthiangnga amahi Messiah eii tia leijetjeinubo?
Hiwa mipa hichu humakheiya iheiwame eini'n nijet, takkha Messiah ajuokaal khanchu, tuteii innum humakheiya ijuome jetnunu.”

Jisu'n Biak-inna iminchule inruoiya inringnga aleiti, “Nangni'n kei ningnajet abe, khat-um kei humakheiya kijuome ningnajet abe? Kei kapumtak thomatorna ranak-ah kijuo emak; Kei kanajuotir ama khachu akadik kha eii, halli nangni'n ama kha jetmakchu.
Takkha kei'n ama kha kajet, ajarchu kei ama diangnga inphut kajuo, khat-um ama'n kei anajuotir.”
Khawa jarra inmani'n ama kha sursik inleitho, takkha tuteii inkhat innum ama chungnga kut leimachulmu, ajarchu ama phakha laheitungmak.
Takkha mipui katamtak in amadiang inlei-ngamna-ah inleiti, “Messiah ajuokaal khan, hiwa mipa itho neek-ah ama'n inlak chuon kheella athosikbe?”
Pharisee ngai'n Jisu jarra mipui'n chor inleitikha inleijet, khantia Thiampu kalianngai khat-um Pharisee ngai'n raalmi lekkhat ama kasursik-ah inleitir.
Jisu'n aleiti, “Kei nangni le aphakhat kalaomsik eii, halli kei kanajuotir amadiang kei'n kasisik eii.
Nangni'n kei ningna-entoksik eii, takkha nangni'n kei namunatun; kei kaom nakhan nangni'n sitheinutun.”
Jihudi ngai'n inkhatli inkhatdiang inlei-inti, “Hunme ama'n sisik itho halli eini'n nimumaksik? Greek khuopui eini mi ngai omna khanbe ama'n asisik halli Greek mi-ngai diangbe ajuominchusik?
‘Nangni'n kei ningna-entoksik eii, takkha nangni'n kei namunatun; kei kaom nakhan nangni'n sitheinutun’ tinahi ama'n ang atiname?”
Kahoi ahekna nikhuo, ahoinakhet nikhuoni, Jisu'n a-ngirra rasa inringnga aleiti, “Tu ka-ang mi khan atui raal inchu, keidiang heiwase inlang juo-inrase. Levi 23:36

Keidiang inngamna mi kha, Pathian chong inthiang khan ileiti angnga, ‘Ringna tuiring ngai'n ama wonsuungnga inluongsik eii.’ ”7:38. Alam 37-38 ah Jisu chong ngaikha hintia malet cha: “Tu ka-ang in atui araal inchu kei diang heiwa inlang khat-um juo-inro.  38  Pathian chong inthiang in iti angnga, ‘Ringna kanapeii tuiring ngai'n ama diang ka-inngamna tak miring suungnga aluongsik eii,’ ” Ezek 47:1; Zech 14:8
Jisu'n hiwahi, amadiang ka-ngamna ngai'n inchangsik Ratha jarra iril eii; khawa phakhan Ratha kha laleipemak, ajarchu Jisu kha lalur lalianmak.
Inmani'n hiwa chong ngaihi inleijet phakhan, miring lekkhat in inleiti, “Hiwa mipa hi inthiangnga Pathian Chongkachoi eii!” 7:40. Pathian Chongkachoi: Enru 1:21.
Leiilak ngai'n inleiti, “Amahi Messiah kha eii!”
Pathian chong inthiang khan Messiah kha David sapa esik eii khat-um David leiomna khuo Bethlehem makheiya heiwasik eii iti emak abe?” 2 Sam 7:12; Mic 5:2
Khawa jarra mipui ngai karra ama jarra inlei-inkhoithen.
Mi lekkhat inchu ama kha inleisurzoot, takkha tuteii inkhat innum ama chungnga kut leimachulmu.
Raalmi ngaikhan inheikir phakhan, Thiampu kalian khat-um Pharisee ngai'n “Angjarra nangni'n ama ning-iheiruoi makme?” tia inleirakel.
Raalmi ngai'n inleimasang, “Hiwa mipa iril angnga tuteii-um hinthoa karil laommu!”
Pharisee ngai'n inmanidiang inleirakel, “Ama'n nangni-um lamleiitiang nakeiruoi bejei?”
“Waikaroon ngai emakli Pharisee ngai'n amadiang ka-ngamna in-ommabejei?
Takkha Sinadan kajetmak mi ngai khachu khomaak inmukha ejei.”
Jisu diang matiangnga kaleiluutjei, inmani karra inkhat ka-eii Nicodemus in inmani diang aleiti, Jn 3:1,2
“Eini sinadan dungjuiya miring khat chungnga ama'n angme ileitho emakli amadiang ra-ngailekleiya chong tan cha-abe?”

Inmani'n inleimasang, “Nang-um Galilee makheiya na-ebe? Pathian chong inthiang kha entokro halli nang in jetnate khachu 7:52. Pathian chongkachoi injirmu; Manuscript inkhat in hinti Pathian chongkachoi hongsuok nunu.Galilee makheiya Pathian chongkachoi injirmu.”
Khale inruoiya inmani'n in-inn in-inntiang inkirjei.
